Entities.Name: cytogenetics_data_extended

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: external_db_links
Columns.Comment: Links to external resources

Columns.Name: hgnc_symbol
Columns.Comment: Gene symbol

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: result
Columns.Comment: Presence or absence of the cytogenetic marker

Columns.Name: sample_id
Columns.Comment: Sample identifier given by the provider

Columns.Name: source
Columns.Comment: (patient, xenograft, cell)

Entities.Comment:
Cytogenetics molecular data

  Cytogenetics data with the model and sample it comes from.

Entities.Name: mutation_data_extended

Columns.Name: allele_frequency
Columns.Comment: Allele frequency, the relative frequency of an allele in a population

Columns.Name: alt_allele
Columns.Comment: The base other than the reference allele seen at the locus

Columns.Name: amino_acid_change
Columns.Comment: Changes in the amino acid due to the variant

Columns.Name: consequence
Columns.Comment: Genomic consequence of this variant, for example: insertion of a codon caused frameshift variation will be considered frameshift variant

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: hgnc_symbol
Columns.Comment: Gene symbol

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: read_depth
Columns.Comment: Read depth, the number of times each individual base was sequenced

Columns.Name: ref_allele
Columns.Comment: The base seen in the reference genome

Columns.Name: sample_id
Columns.Comment: Sample identifier given by the provider

Columns.Name: seq_start_position
Columns.Comment: Location on the genome at which the variant is found

Columns.Name: source
Columns.Comment: (patient, xenograft, cell)

Entities.Comment:
Mutation molecular data

  Mutation data with the model and sample it comes from.

Entities.Name: model_metadata

Columns.Name: accessibility
Columns.Comment: Defines any limitation of access of the model per type of users like academia only, industry and academia, or national limitation

Columns.Name: cancer_grade
Columns.Comment: The implanted tumor grade value

Columns.Name: cancer_grading_system
Columns.Comment: Stage classification system used to describe the stage

Columns.Name: cancer_stage
Columns.Comment: Stage of the patient at the time of collection

Columns.Name: cancer_system
Columns.Comment: Cancer System

Columns.Name: collection_site
Columns.Comment: Site of collection of the tissue sample (can be different than the primary site if tumour type is metastatic)

Columns.Name: contact_email_list
Columns.Comment: Emails of the contact names for the model

Columns.Name: contact_form_url
Columns.Comment: URL to the providers resource for each model

Columns.Name: contact_name_list
Columns.Comment: List of names of the contact people for the model

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: engraftment_sample_state
Columns.Comment: PDX Engraftment material state (e.g. fresh or frozen)

Columns.Name: engraftment_sample_type
Columns.Comment: Description of the type of material grafted into the mouse. (e.g. tissue fragments, cell suspension)

Columns.Name: engraftment_site
Columns.Comment: Organ or anatomical site used for the tumour engraftment (e.g. mammary fat pad, Right flank)

Columns.Name: engraftment_type
Columns.Comment: Orthotopic: if the tumour was engrafted at a corresponding anatomical site. Hererotopic: If grafted subcuteanously

Columns.Name: europdx_access_modalities
Columns.Comment: If a model is part of EUROPDX consortium, then this field defines if the model is accessible for transnational access through the EDIReX infrastructure, or only on a collaborative basis

Columns.Name: histology
Columns.Comment: Diagnosis at time of collection of the patient tumor

Columns.Name: host_strain_name
Columns.Comment: Host mouse strain name (e.g. NOD-SCID, NSG, etc)

Columns.Name: host_strain_nomenclature
Columns.Comment: The full nomenclature form of the host mouse strain name

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: passage_number
Columns.Comment: Passage number

Columns.Name: patient_age
Columns.Comment: Patient age at collection

Columns.Name: patient_ethnicity
Columns.Comment: Patient Ethnic group

Columns.Name: patient_sex
Columns.Comment: Sex of the patient

Columns.Name: patient_treatment_status
Columns.Comment: Patient treatment status

Columns.Name: primary_site
Columns.Comment: Site of the primary tumor where primary cancer is originating from (may not correspond to the site of the current tissue sample)

Columns.Name: provider_name
Columns.Comment: Provider full name

Columns.Name: pubmed_ids
Columns.Comment: PubMed ids related to the model

Columns.Name: source_database_url
Columns.Comment: URL to the source database for each model

Columns.Name: tumor_type
Columns.Comment: Collected tumor type

Columns.Name: type
Columns.Comment: Model type (xenograft, cell_line, )

Entities.Comment:
Model metadata

  Metadata associated to a model.

Entities.Name: model_quality_assurance

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: description
Columns.Comment: Short description of what was compared and what was the result: (e.g. high, good, moderate concordance between xenograft, 'model validated against histological features of same diagnosis' or 'not determined')

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: passages_tested
Columns.Comment: List of all passages where validation was performed. Passage 0 correspond to first engraftment

Columns.Name: validation_host_strain_nomenclature
Columns.Comment: Validation host mouse strain, following mouse strain nomenclature from MGI JAX

Columns.Name: validation_technique
Columns.Comment: Any technique used to validate PDX against their original patient tumour, including fingerprinting, histology, immunohistochemistry

Entities.Comment:
Quality assurance

  Quality assurance data related to a model.

Entities.Name: expression_data_extended

Columns.Name: affy_hgea_expression_value
Columns.Comment: Expresion value captured using Affymetrix arrays

Columns.Name: affy_hgea_probe_id
Columns.Comment: Affymetrix probe identifier

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: external_db_links
Columns.Comment: Links to external resources

Columns.Name: hgnc_symbol
Columns.Comment: Gene symbol

Columns.Name: illumina_hgea_expression_value
Columns.Comment: Expresion value captured using Illumina arrays

Columns.Name: illumina_hgea_probe_id
Columns.Comment: Illumina probe identifier

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: rnaseq_count
Columns.Comment: Read counts of the gene

Columns.Name: rnaseq_coverage
Columns.Comment: The ratio between the number of bases of the mapped reads by the number of bases of a reference

Columns.Name: rnaseq_fpkm
Columns.Comment: Gene expression value represented in Fragments per kilo base of transcript per million mapped fragments (FPKM)

Columns.Name: rnaseq_tpm
Columns.Comment: Gene expression value represented in transcript per million (TPM)

Columns.Name: sample_id
Columns.Comment: Sample identifier given by the provider

Columns.Name: source
Columns.Comment: (patient, xenograft, cell)

Columns.Name: z_score
Columns.Comment: Z-score representing the gene expression level

Entities.Comment:
Expression molecular data

  Expression data with the model and sample it comes from.

Entities.Name: cna_data_extended

Columns.Name: copy_number_status
Columns.Comment: Details whether there was a gain or loss of function. Categorized into gain, loss

Columns.Name: data_source
Columns.Comment: Data source of the model (provider abbreviation)

Columns.Name: external_db_links
Columns.Comment: Links to external resources

Columns.Name: gistic_value
Columns.Comment: Score predicted using GISTIC tool for the copy number variation

Columns.Name: hgnc_symbol
Columns.Comment: Gene symbol

Columns.Name: log10r_cna
Columns.Comment: Log10 scaled copy number variation ratio

Columns.Name: log2r_cna
Columns.Comment: Log2 scaled copy number variation ratio

Columns.Name: model_id
Columns.Comment: Full name of the model used by provider

Columns.Name: picnic_value
Columns.Comment: Score predicted using PICNIC algorithm for the copy number variation

Columns.Name: sample_id
Columns.Comment: Sample identifier given by the provider

Columns.Name: source
Columns.Comment: (patient, xenograft, cell)

Entities.Comment:
CNA molecular data

  CNA data with the model and sample it comes from.
